text: Listen to me. Get down here.

text: I told you I heard something, asshole.

text: You a big man with a gun?

text: No, you'll be just like him.

text: You should have let the kid shoot.

text: You robbing son of a bitch!

text: No one's breaking into my place,you son of a bitch!

text: I want Ricky there by noon.

text: You're not in a position to bargain.If you know where the body is, tell me.

text: Get Dianne and Ricky and their doctor.We'll meet them at the airport.
